madhyawediyeku asana prashnayakata deshapalakayeku – deshapalakaya yanu rate palana prathipaththi gana wagakiwa yuthu pudgalaya nisa – labadena pilithura thula janathawata danagannata awashya de pilibandawa ohu ho aya ketharam wadagath kara salakanawada, ema gataluwa pilibanda deshapalakayage prathipaththiya saha buddhi mattama kumakda yana karunu pahadiliwa prathibimbagatha we.
